about_the_game:
Driving Strikers is a 2.5D car football extravaganza in a 90s-style! Play 4-player matches across 5 different stadiums with wildly different and beautiful environments!

Main Features:

  • Play 1-4 local multiplayer matches on the same screen!
  • Play online against up to 3 other players in the first ever indie game where you can crossplay with players on SEGA's final console - the Dreamcast!
  • Challenge the AI in the League mode to win your way to the top
  • Listen to the awesome and endlessly catchy soundtrack by musician George Ryan
detailed_description:
Driving Strikers is a 2.5D car football extravaganza in a 90s-style! Play 4-player matches across 5 different stadiums with wildly different and beautiful environments!

Main Features:

  • Play 1-4 local multiplayer matches on the same screen!
  • Play online against up to 3 other players in the first ever indie game where you can crossplay with players on SEGA's final console - the Dreamcast!
  • Challenge the AI in the League mode to win your way to the top
  • Listen to the awesome and endlessly catchy soundtrack by musician George Ryan

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Fedora 37 / Ubuntu 22.04 / SteamOS 3.4
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor or SoC
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or later
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Fedora 37 / Ubuntu 22.04 / SteamOS 3.4
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor or SoC
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
